name: Ardan GmbH
goal:
Project management and execution of complex deployment projects in Europe with synergies between transport, telecommunication and Energy. Introducing Innovation and New Technologies focusing on Clean Transport, Electric Vehicles, Smart Grids, ICT, alternative fuels charging infrastructure, Digital infrastructure and Intermodality as well as Connected & Autonmous Driving. Focusing on delivering Transport, Energy and Communications projects, from their R&D phase into testing, real life pilots and then into deployment of mass market rollout. Implementation of projects and networks with variety of industries with private and public bodies, coordination of many stakeholders in joint projects, dissemination events, public consultations, and ongoing discussions with Member States.

Managing team of experts in different fields - legal, policy, network planning, financial and business modelling, public procurement and working in project management, R&D, ICT corporate development and financing.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, International co-operation and development, Single market, Transport
